name: Mars
title: God of War
lore: Mars is the god of war, son of heaven. He fights not for glory, but for the love of battle itself.

spearOfMars.name: Spear of Mars
spearOfMars.description: Mars throws his spear, damaging enemies. The first hero hit is knocked back and pinned to terrain.

godsRebuke.name: God's Rebuke
godsRebuke.description: Mars smashes enemies in front of him, dealing critical damage and knocking them back.

bulwark.name: Bulwark
bulwark.description: Mars takes reduced damage from the front and sides. Can be activated to redirect attacks.

arenaOfBlood.name: Arena of Blood
arenaOfBlood.description: Mars creates an arena where enemies can't leave. Soldiers attack anyone trying to escape.
